name: RX_NDG
description: This table can be used to extract data related with package information, associated medication, implied unit, physical owner, and logical owner for National Drug Code (NDC) grouper records.

columns.name: NDG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the NDG (NDC Grouper).

columns.name: NDG_ID_NDG_NAME
columns.description: Name of the NDC Grouper record.

columns.name: NDG_NAME
columns.description: Name of the NDC Grouper record.
